error.title: Error page!

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

axios.400Description: Server cannot or will not process the request.
axios.401Description: No valid authentication credentials for the requested resource.
axios.403Description: You do not have authorization to access these resources.
axios.500Description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
axios.503Description: The server is not ready to handle the request.
axios.504Description: The server did not get a response in time.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
